duties_responsibilities.duty: Building and operating highly scalable software using cutting edge technologies for a variety of devices.
Solving complex problems in the areas of distributed computing and high-volume transaction processing.
Maintaining a test-driven mindset with a focus on unit and integration testing.
Contributing to open source projects and participating in cross training opportunities.
Mentoring and teaching, sharing experiences, best practices, and knowledge to elevate the team.
Producing world-class products with skilled management of competing priorities and effective communication within a collaborative team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related discipline (Master's or PhD preferred)
